summary: The diff does not provide visible evidence that the Lily detail page engagement row was repositioned as required, and it includes modifications to project/meta summary files that were not requested and appear out of scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Lily detail page (frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx) so the engagement row (likes, replies, views) always renders directly below the lilyâ€™s main content block (title+description, then image/link if present, then engagement row), without changing other pages/components.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided LilyPage.tsx diff is truncated before showing the relevant JSX section where the engagement row would be rendered/moved, so there is no confirmable evidence in the diff summary that the engagement row placement was changed to the required fixed location.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx (truncated before engagement-row rendering/placement is shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added extensive application-wide documentation/state summaries (including references to a TagPage route and multiple other components/pages) unrelated to the requested Lily detail page layout change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints asked to keep changes scoped to the Lily detail page layout and not refactor other areas; modifying these meta summary/state files is not part of REQ-1 and appears out of scope.
